subject: Investing
title: Dollar Strength and Global Investing
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Dollar Strength and Global Investing.

hook.text: When the US dollar strengthened 25% in 2022, emerging market returns for US investors were crushed.

buildup.text: A strong dollar makes foreign assets cheaper to buy but reduces returns when converting back to dollars.

discovery.text: Many emerging countries borrow in dollars. A strong dollar raises their debt burden, pressuring their economies.

twist.text: Dollar cycles reverse. When the dollar weakens, international stocks get a powerful tailwind for US investors.

climax.text: Buying international stocks during dollar strength means you're getting them 'on sale'â€”if you have a long horizon.

punchline.text: The dollar is a cycle, not a trend. Today's strength is tomorrow's global tailwind.

quiz.question: What happens to international returns for US investors when the dollar strengthens?
options: They decrease when converted to dollars
